title: Charming London Stay with Traditional Afternoon Tea
description:
Standing proud on the edge of leafy Russell Square Park, The Morton Hotel invites you to discover London’s literary hotspot of Bloomsbury, the former stomping ground of acclaimed author Virginia Woolf. Enjoy a prime location within walking distance of Covent Garden and Oxford Street and a quick tube ride away from Buckingham Palace, Westminster Abbey and the tolling bells of Big Ben. Experience a boutique escape staying in true British elegance with a welcome drink on arrival - glass of white port, anyone? - daily buffet breakfast and a traditional afternoon tea experience with unmissable scones, jam and clotted cream.
